translations.translation: No default payment method has been selected. Please go to the billing section to select one or add a new one.
Your default payment method has expired. Please go to thebilling section to enter a new one.
Your default payment method will expire in less than 30 days. Please go to thebilling section to enter a new one.
Your default payment method (bank account) is in default. Please go to the billing section to check for any errors and/or enter a new payment method.
Your default payment method (credit card) is in error. Please go to the billing section to check for any errors and/or enter a new payment method.
Your default payment method (PayPal) is in error. Please go to the billing section to check for any errors and/or enter a new payment method.
You have {{count}} bank account(s) awaiting validation. Please go to the billing section to get more information.
You have {{count}} credit card(s) in default. Please go to the billing section to check the situation and/or enter a new payment method.
You have {{count}} PayPal account(s) in error. Please go to the billing section to check the situation and/or enter a new payment method.
Your OVH account is outstanding by {{value}} as of {{date | date:'medium'}}. Please go to the billing section to settle the amount.
You owe {{value}}. Please go to the billing section to settle the amount.
You owe {{ dueAmount }} (including an amount of {{ unmaturedAmount }} unmatured). Please go to the billing section to settle the amount.
Your OVH account has reached the threshold you defined. Please go to the billing section for more information.
You have {{count}} pending order(s) requiring documents. Please go to the "My Orders" section to do the update.
Choose automatic renewal for your services now!
